intent: Add to Bickford knowledge: summary of Claude Cowork/AI-coded 10-day sprint article
summary: Anthropic reportedly shipped the Claude Cowork agent in ~10 days by having humans plan/architect while Claude Code generated implementation. The article frames this as a shift to human-orchestrated, AI-written software, highlights unexpected adoption by non-technical teams for analytics and automation, and notes security/product maturity risks when AI agents get broad system access.
